features: Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL
Body: 65 g/m² 85% recycled polyester, 15% elastane plain weave with FlashDry™
Liner: 50D 135 g/m² 87% polyester, 13% elastane-knit jersey with FlashDry™
FlashDry™ keeps you cool and dry
Outer shorts are perforated for breathability in key heat zones
Compression liner for added support and coverage
Reflective logo on right hem and Flight Series™ logo on back-right hem for enhanced visibility.
